member.name: T:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Extensions.DbContextExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for the db context type.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Extensions.DbContextExtensions.CreateDbContextSubstitute``1(``0)
member.summary: Creates and sets up a mocked db context.
member.remarks: dbContextToMock would typically be an in-memory database instance.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Extensions.DbContextExtensions.CreateMock``1(``0)
member.summary: Creates and sets up a mocked db context.
member.remarks: dbContextToMock would typically be an in-memory database instance.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Extensions.DbContextExtensions.CreateAndAttachMockedDbSetTo``2(``0,``0)
member.summary: Creates and attaches a mocked db set to a mocked db context.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Extensions.DbContextExtensions.CreateAndAttachMockedDbQueryTo``2(``0,``0)
member.summary: Creates and attaches a mocked db query to a mocked db context.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Extensions.DbContextExtensions.AddExecuteSqlCommandResult``1(``0,System.Int32,System.Action)
member.summary: Sets up ExecuteSqlCommand invocations to return a specified result.
member.param: The integer to return when ExecuteSqlCommand is invoked.
Operations to perform after ExecuteSqlCommand is invoked.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Extensions.DbContextExtensions.AddExecuteSqlCommandResult``1(``0,System.String,System.Int32,System.Action)
member.summary: Sets up ExecuteSqlCommand invocations containing a specified sql string to return a specified result.
member.param: The ExecuteSqlCommand sql string. Set up supports case insensitive partial matches.
The integer to return when ExecuteSqlCommand is invoked.
Operations to perform after ExecuteSqlCommand is invoked.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Extensions.DbContextExtensions.AddExecuteSqlCommandResult``1(``0,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Object},System.Int32,System.Action)
member.summary: Sets up ExecuteSqlCommand invocations containing a specified sql string and parameters to return a specified result.
member.param: The ExecuteSqlCommand sql string. Set up supports case insensitive partial matches.
The ExecuteSqlCommand parameters. Set up supports case insensitive partial parameter sequence matching.
The integer to return when ExecuteSqlCommand is invoked.
Operations to perform after ExecuteSqlCommand is invoked.
